name: orbiting bloom
description: Four moons orbit a hidden center. Differing rotational speeds create a mesmerizing, ethereal trace of blue light..

name: Gravel (Schotter)
description: Order slowly dissolves into chaos. The distortion increases exponentially from top to bottom, showing algorithmic entropy.

name: Chroma Entropy (Schotter)
description: This piece illustrates algorithmic decay where random color and exponential distortion dissolve geometric order into a vibrant chaos..

name: Chromatic Shiver (Schotter)
description: Algorithmic chaos flickers uncontrollably as randomness resets sixty times every second, dissolving geometric form.

name: Subliminal Current
description: Invisible Perlin noise generates an evolving vector field. Thousands of particles trace the subtle, ethereal currents, visualizing digital wind.

name: Spectrum Flow
description: Perlin noise generates an organic vector field. Particle direction controls hue, creating a slowly swirling and evolving spectrum..

name: NaVectorial Flow Mapme
description: Perlin noise generates a vector grid. Particles track this moving field, visualizing digital energy through structure and motion.

name: The Swarm Conductor
description: Sparkling stardust trails behind the pointer. Each touch produces a deep, sharp chord, creating a terrifying echo as if you were unaware of space..
